Name: SkydiveSim - Skydiving Simulator
About the game: SkydiveSim brings the thrill of skydiving and BASE jumping to your headset. No more waiting on weather on bad weather days. Put on your headset and choose from our numerus levels. Jump from a plane 10,000 feet above ground. Challenge yourself to go through the free fall rings. Then pull your ripcord and fly under the canopy and finally work on your accuracy and land on the target. You don't need a plane ride back up, just repeat in the same scene or choose another one of our environments to jump into. Want even more excitement? BASE jump from top of the buildings, windmills and light towers, pull the ripcord and navigate to the ground!
